# Festival Revenue Breakdown

Simple bar chart showing revenue by category for a mid-size music festival (10,000 attendees).

## Revenue Categories

- Tickets: $750,000
- Food & Beverage: $180,000
- Merchandise: $95,000
- Sponsorships: $120,000
- VIP Upgrades: $85,000

## Style

- Colors: Deep purple (#6B46C1), electric coral (#FF6B6B), sky blue (#4299E1)
- White space: 40%+ composition
- Typography: Clean sans-serif, 16pt minimum
- Context: Festival entry gates, crowd silhouettes

## Structure

Vertical bar chart with 5 categories. Each bar labeled with category name and dollar amount. Total revenue ($1.23M) displayed prominently at top.
